name: Hive
description: Bees swarm at the ground target location, creating a new Hive that provides movement and Attack Speed Buffs to Ah Muzen Cab. He also heals for a small amount every second while he remains close to the Hives. Hives reveal enemies within 20 units of them and will notify Ah Muzen Cab if they are destroyed. The Hives can only be destroyed by Basic Attacks (maximum 6 Hives).
